alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 31 at 6:13PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, light to moderate snow may develop this evening generating up to an inch of additional snow accumulation. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...INL, Mud Lake, Rexburg, and Idaho Falls. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Upper Snake River Plain
